descript.abstract: Metro lines in the Washington, DC metropolitan region. The dataset contains locations and attributes of Metro lines, created as part of the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) by participating D.C. government agencies. Lines were taken from legacy data from WMATA.
descript.purpose: Metro lines in the Washington, DC metropolitan region.

cntorgp.cntorg: D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer

attracc.attraccr: Data believed to be complete and accurate as of the time period cited. Subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. Not validated by source and/or responsible agency.

dataqual.logic: Not validated by source and/or responsible agency.
dataqual.complete: Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. Not validated by source and/or responsible agency.

horizpa.horizpar: Not validated by source and/or responsible agency. However, these lines are more accurate than previous versions, especially underground since they came from the WMATA Surveyor's office.

srcinfo.srccontr: base geography for correction to planimetrics

procstep.procdesc: Staff modified the layer to reflect the yellow line extension.

cntorgp.cntorg: Office of the Chief Technology Officer

procstep.procdesc: Using metro lines acquired from the surveyor's office at WMATA, staff created a ten foot buffer and traced both sided of the buffer with the Trace Tool. Staff then joined with the separating lines with the Sketch Tool and erased the sections of line that had been redrawn. Thus, the shared metro lines, such as the orange and blue, have an approximate 20 foot offset. Staff also digitized the blue line extension following the track construction outline contained in the 2005 orthophotos. A union of all the line segments was done to make one polyline for each metro line. Staff formatted the attribution to match existing layers for continuity.

cntorgp.cntorg: Office of the Chief Technology Officer

procstep.procdesc: Added yellow and orange line rush plus.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
